text: Marcus Belgrave (June 12, 1936 - May 24, 2015) was an American jazz trumpet player. He was born in Chester, Pennsylvania, but raised in Detroit, Michigan. He recorded with a variety of famous musicians, bandleaders, and record labels since the 1950s. Belgrave died on May 24, 2015, in Ann Arbor, Michigan of heart failure, aged 78. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania Category:Musicians from Michigan
title: Marcus Belgrave
